doc.field: Record Group 15. (RESTRICTED) Audiovisual (1950s-2008, undated; 26.42 linear feet)
Record Group 15. (RESTRICTED) Audiovisual (1950s-2008, undated; 26.42 linear feet)

The Audiovisual record group contains audio or moving visual recordings. Types of materials include film reels, audio tape, cassette tapes, VHS and other video cassettes, and vinyl records. The title or identifier for each individual item is listed in this inventory. The majority of content has been captured by amateurs, such as school employees, with some professional recordings. For all materials in this record group, audio and visual content has been identified solely by labels or other written description accompanying objects (not by playback).
Record Group 15. (RESTRICTED) Audiovisual (1950s-2008, undated; 26.42 linear feet)
